value:
$WmMPID_セテス,ch17_27_Seteth_M_Normal,Face|Time may pass and the world may
change, but people will never stop
fighting each other.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_08,0|$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face|Fly now, Triandra...$k$pBring the álfar who have allied with
the mortals just what they deserve...
Bring them death. All of them.$k$p$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_Normal,Face|As you will it, Lady Freyja...$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face|...$k$pTriandra...$k$p$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_Normal,Face|Something more, Lady Freyja?$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face|Plumeria...and you continue obeying
even as the life within you is worn
down until nothing is left... Why?$k$pI have...used you. And you know it.
Yet even still... So I ask again: Why?$k$p$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_Normal,Face|My life belongs to you, Lady Freyja...
Everything I have, everything I AM...
It's all because of you. I am yours.$k$pIf I can offer you any comfort, I will.
No matter what. That is your answer.$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face|You believe you...owe it to me?$k$p$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_Normal,Face|Yes.$k$p...Well, no. There's more. It is not
proper for me to admit this, but...$k$pPlumeria and I... We adore you.$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face|You...adore me? You think
so highly of me...as that?$k$p$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_Normal,Face|My memories of mortal life are
like those of a dream from long
ago, but they are not all gone...$k$pI remember wanting to do kind things
for those I care about... Even if there
was no reward... Even if I died...$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face|...I do not understand.$k$pIf you die, you can no longer be with
the person you care for. So what is
the purpose, then?$k$pIs that the way of mortal love?
Because their fragile lives are
so easily ended, I suppose.$k$pWe gods are above such pitiable
short-sightedness.$k$p$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_Normal,Face|Apologies, Lady Freyja... Such lowly
thoughts have no place in your ears.
I will take my leave.$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$Sbs1000|
